statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_grades WHERE grade < 60 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM LearningOutcomes WHERE assessment_type = 'exam';
SELECT outcome_id, outcome_description FROM LearningOutcomes;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT course_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY highest_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, feedback FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade < 60 AND feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sg.student_id, lo.outcome_description, lo.assessment_type FROM StudentGrades sg JOIN LearningOutcomes lo ON sg.course_id = lo.outcome_id;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 80
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_name, department FROM students INNER JOIN instructors ON students.course_id = instructors.instructor_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, course_id, grade FROM students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE student_id = 1001

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, instructor_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE grade > 70 ORDER BY instructor_name ASC

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, email FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_course FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrolled_course FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade_value FROM grades WHERE grade_value > 80 ORDER BY grade_value DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback_content FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 80;

SELECT student_name, course_name, feedback_text FROM Students JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id JOIN Courses ON Feedback.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_id = 2;
